snippet.title: Athena (SNK, 1987) - NES Gameplay
snippet.description:
Athena sat on the top of Mount Olympus one day, pondering... More her existence. She decided that being the Goddess of Wisdom wasn't good enough for her. She concluded that she must leave her castle and head for the Fantasy World, where life as a Princess of Victory awaited. In Athena, you control the goddess on her quest. Obtaining weapons such as bows and arrows and balls and chains, battle your way through the horizontal landscapes that make up the Fantasy World, gaining experience with each weapon you collect. Enemies such as the Golem and flaming Medusa will try and stop you, so it won't be easy.  Christopher Michael Baker, All Game Guide


NESGUIDE ARCHIVE INFO

The original NES gameplay archive, est 2007 includes gameplay captures from all commercial releases from the US market with a few extras (like famicom releases) just for fun. As of Dec 2024, I've resumed efforts to update some of the older (some 360p) videos with higher-def captures. Text updates will be posted to BlueSky (which doesn't require an account to view). Please follow there (or just bookmark the url) if you're interested!

https://bsky.app/profile/nesguide.com
